definition: ice/CL:塊|块[kuai4]/to chill sth/(of an object or substance) to feel cold/(of a person) cold/unfriendly/(slang) methamphetamine

the five Liang of the Sixteen Kingdoms, namely: Former Liang 前涼|前凉 (314-376), Later Liang 後涼|后凉 (386-403), Northern Liang 北涼|北凉 (398-439), Southern Liang 南涼|南凉 (397-414), Western Liang 西涼|西凉 (400-421)

sentences.english: One long swallow of the cold beverage cooled my sweating body.

sentences.english: She opened the door, stepped over the lintel, and on to the damp, cold earth of the passage outside.
sentences.chinese: 她打開門，跨過門檻，踩到過廳潮溼的冰涼的地上。

sentences.english: We wiggled our toes in the cool water of the creek.
sentences.chinese: 我們在小溪冰涼的水中扭動我們的腳趾頭。

sentences.english: It was all carried with ice-cold snow on my forehead,and my tears came flooding out incessantly.
sentences.chinese: 額頭是冰涼的雪，我的淚水也奪眶而出。

sentences.english: Feel like pins and needles, it was so cold.
sentences.chinese: 覺得像被針扎，那淚是如此的冰涼。

sentences.english: The shock of the icy air ended Claire's torpor .

sentences.english: My blood froze and I felt weak and faint.
sentences.chinese: 我嚇得渾身冰涼，感到身子虛弱，頭腦發暈。

sentences.english: These things give a person a kind of icy and formalist sense.
sentences.chinese: 這些東西給人一種冰涼死板的感覺。

sentences.english: And it's hard o hold a candle, in the cold November Rain.
sentences.chinese: 在這冰涼的十一月的雨裏，愛的火焰已成雨中之燭。

sentences.english: I don't like memories, large tracts of the feelings of sadness, tentacle.
sentences.chinese: 從來都不喜歡回憶，大片大片的憂傷情緒，觸手冰涼。

sentences.english: The old man's waxen face was cold.
Or in the cold Can Dong end?
sentences.chinese: 還是在冰涼的殘冬結束？

sentences.english: Smoking women, inside a cold surface such as Lingxiaohua.
sentences.chinese: 吸菸的女人，內心冰涼如面一朵凌霄花。

sentences.english: Sometimes, patients find themselves short of breath, cold hands and feet.
sentences.chinese: 有時候，患者發現自己呼吸急促，手腳冰涼。

sentences.english: The cold tip of the knife.
The fog, the cool mist and all that emptiness consumed my thoughts for a moment.
sentences.chinese: 我一時沉浸在冰涼的霧氣與空蕩的愁緒中。

to freeze/to feel very cold/aspic or jelly
